rev.comment: BOT: [[User:H3llBot/T2|Checking dead links]]; Added 3 archived Wayback links
/* FIFA World Cup record */ No need to increase pixel size.
/* Scandal and suspension */ Found some new pictures that could come in handy. I'll be moving them around.
[[:en:WP:CLEANER|WikiCleaner]] 0.99 - Repairing link to disambiguation page - [[WP:DPL|(You can help)]]
/* From glory to decline */ Making minor grammar fixes.
Mixing stumpy Records section with Fixtures section into "Records and Fixtures" section that seem to fit well together.
/* From glory to decline */ made some minor changes, I think this makes more sense, since the match was against Argentina and not Maradona
Undid revision 383284623 by [[Special:Contributions/174.89.36.170|174.89.36.170]] ([[User talk:174.89.36.170|talk]]) Maradona pretty much carried his team to victory in the game; references present.
/* Current squad */ He is not in the references. Please provide a suitable reference for this person.
/* External links */ Removing deleted template (there was some discussion about this in the Footie section; but oh well).
/* Scandal and suspension */ This image was deleted, apparently, due to lack of verification or something. It no longer meets the requirements for this article. New one would be great.
/* Managers */ Updating overall stats. Yay, now on the 30s.
Carlos Bazalar was never called up
Undid revision 381836375 by [[Special:Contributions/Transaction Go|Transaction Go]] ([[User talk:Transaction Go|talk]])
/* Current squad */ Because the page is easier to read
/* Players */ some minor changes, removed numbers as per [[WP:NOR]], rearrange player in alphabetical order, plus other minor changes
/* Current squad */ If the club's name is practically unaffected by its long name, please leave it that way. It frees up space.
/* Current squad */ Local players called up by Markarian to face against Canada and Jamaica. Official 11 list not yet out, but these will be the ones used (Butron, Quinteros, and Ramos might appear).
Undid revision 380564489 by [[Special:Contributions/24.90.218.109|24.90.218.109]] ([[User talk:24.90.218.109|talk]]) As nice as the future stadium looks, we can only work with the current look here.
/* Good games, few titles */ Removed a comma
/* Uniform */ I tried looking for the Peruvian "Power" sports company, but it seems to not have made it to the internet.
/* Players */ IP's, you're awesome! Good job!
/* Players */ Here is something to work with in the mean time prior to the September games. These are the international players, and it's sourced.
/* Uniform */ Updating the kits section with the brands. More updates soon to come.
/* Players */ reverted edit by IP user as per [[WP:SPECULATION]]

/* Current Possible squad */ hide section once again, deleted all the players that aren't with the team and left only the 7 players that are part of the current squad, didn't have time to add the other 11, hopefully someone will add them
/* Managers */ Updating the table, adding a few references. References still basic, but all will be "fixed" and re-checked soon.
Removing "Juanvargas1.jpg", it has been deleted from Commons by [[commons:User:High Contrast|High Contrast]] because: [[commons:COM:L|Copyright violation]].
Reverted 3 edits by [[Special:Contributions/24.94.113.208|24.94.113.208]] identified as [[WP:VAND|vandalism]] to last revision by [[User:Kevin McE|Kevin McE]]. ([[WP:TW|TW]])
Some or all of: FIFA rank update; remove flags in or above infobox, unsourced famous players, out of date squads, Underage teams; blank null fields; tournament history rationalisation.
/* Fixtures */ World Cup already has its section. Still need some sources for this section, but I can place them.
robot Adding: [[gl:Selección de fútbol de Perú]]
Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/24.94.113.208|24.94.113.208]]; Possible test edit?. ([[WP:TW|TW]])
/* Players */ added hidden message (Before making any changes please see the discussion page

Reverted to revision 375664905 by [[Special:Contributions/MarshalN20|MarshalN20]]; possible vandalism?. ([[WP:TW|TW]])
/* Fixtures */ It was West Germany, and Peru lost 3-1. Not a good performance. Section needs a few refs.
Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/Wcwarlord|Wcwarlord]]; Possible test edit?. ([[WP:TW|TW]])
/* Players */ hided squad, until a current squad can be established
/* Fixtures */ Improving this section without sources. Will next add the sources to the information and fix the matter accordingly.
Adding a few little things to the article. Preparing for another FA review challenge.
/* Fixtures */ Moving Bibliography. Hoping to add some more soon.
Peru dresses mainly in white. The most common nickname is blanquirroja (white and red), not Rojiblanca (red and white).
/* FIFA World Cup record */ Moving the information.
/* Memorable games */ Adding this information into the FIFA World Cup record section.
/* World Cup record */ Imitating the Scotland article.
/* External links */ Mariscal Sucre is a friendly trophy dispute. Not much of a tourney.
/* Recent history */ Choosing a new coach has nothing to do with the FIFA rankings.
/* Managers */ Updating this section with the correct information.
Peru made the 2nd round in 1978, not the quarters.
/* Notable players */ Deleting section. Quiroga image soon to be moved.
/* Notable players */ Moving things a bit. This section needs to be deleted. I'll rescue the most important material from here.
/* History */ Updating the history, moving a bit things around, markarian added, 1982 free image added. Need to fix and re-check links.
[[Help:Reverting|Reverted]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/69.68.142.176|69.68.142.176]] ([[User talk:69.68.142.176|talk]]) to last version by 190.43.244.168
/* Other tournaments and records */ Mixing section into history.
/* Other tournaments and records */ moving information.
/* Other tournaments and records */ Placed deleted information into the history section.
/* From glory to decline */ Moving information.

/* Current squad */ Arroe is under-19 player, not really part of senior Peru team
some mistakes in the players' teams but , now are already.
/* Current squad */ Making country abbreviations into full names.
/* Uniform */ Adding picture of player wearing the national kit.

/* Players */ Placing World Cup qualifying team on its specific page (no need for it in here by this point). Creating wikilinks to the squad. Placing clubs with flags, but with country names attached.
/* Current squad */ Adding the flagathlete template dealies. They help better show the country with the flag name, or something like that for the MoS.
/* Other tournaments and records */ Shortening a sentence.
[[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 324424176 by [[Special:Contributions/99.235.160.143|99.235.160.143]] ([[User talk:99.235.160.143|talk]]) Reverting Good faith edit. No need to shorten names.
/* Current squad */ There's no need to shorten Zambrano's name. I also fixed the problem with a similar named baseball player by a creating a disambiguation page and other whatnot.
